name: dankGnu.github.io
body:
### dankGnu repositories.

> Those who would give up essential Liberty, to purchase a little 
> temporary Safety, deserve neither Liberty nor Safety.
- Benjamin Franklin

dankGnu repositories are here to help you be free. 


### Dotfiles
Dotfiles for a xmonad desktop.
[https://github.com/dankgnu/dotfiles](https://github.com/dankgnu/dotfiles)

```
# Clones the dotfiles repository into the current directory in terminal
$ git clone https://github.com/dankGnu/dotfiles.git
$ cd dotfiles
```
Todo:
- [X] Update dzen_network.sh
- [X] Incorporate VPN Toggle
- [ ] Fix dzen script buttons
- [ ] Phase out Arch menu



### OpenVPN Toggle
Bash script for toggling openvpn.
***Comming Soon***
